name: Aeropuerto Internacional Coronel FAP Francisco Secada Vignetta
nameEnglish: Coronel FAP Francisco Secada Vignetta International Airport
description: Coronel FAP Francisco Secada Vignetta International is one of the main gateways to the Peruvian Amazon Rainforest. Its airport code comes from the city of *Iq*ui*t*os.
